name: PHP UTF-8 Library
short_description: This is a successor to https://sourceforge.net/projects/phputf8/, which unfortunately seems to be abandoned since several years. Contrary to the fork on https://github.com/FSX/php-utf8/, this project tries to stay compatible with the original phputf8 and with ancient PHP versions (4.3 and later are supported).
summary: Tools for working with UTF-8 in PHP
